message: Let's be fair and split it 60-40. It's the first round and we both get the most value out of the money now.
Your 60-40 split seems a bit off, Alice. How about we go 55-45? It's still a good deal for you in the early rounds.
I see you're willing to negotiate, but 55-45 is not enough for me. How about we meet in the middle between my original offer and yours?
We're running out of time, Alice. I'm willing to meet closer to the middle, but it has to be a significant jump from your last offer. 53-47 is my compromise.
You're getting closer, but I still think I deserve a bit more. Considering the inflation is hitting you harder, I'm willing to make a smaller concession. This is my new offer.
Alice, let's stop this dance. We're past the halfway point, and the inflation is eating away at the value. A 50-50 split is the only fair option. Take it or leave it.
